Title: Picture Organizer
Description:
This project will focus on a nice, clean and fast interface to organize albums and pictures on Facebook.
Upload pictures on facebook, create new facebook albums, resize pictures before sending them to facebook.

Project will be based on the Caliburn.Micro framework in c#.NET WPF!
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project will focus on a nice, clean and fast interface to organize albums and pictures on Facebook.
Upload pictures on facebook, create new facebook albums, resize pictures before sending them to facebook.

Project will be based on the Caliburn.Micro framework in c#.NET WPF!

This project is still under construction and there are no downloads available yet.
